ubc.pavlab.gotrack.go

Class SimilarityAnalysis

  • java.lang.Object
    • ubc.pavlab.gotrack.go.SimilarityAnalysis

  • public class SimilarityAnalysis
extends java.lang.Object
    This class computes the jaccard similarity. That is how similar is a gene to itself across different goa editions
    Author:
    asedeno

      This function uses the jaccard similarity to tell how similar is one gene in edition X to itself in edition Y (last edition)

      static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
      For testing only
      void similarityAnalysisJaccard(java.lang.String species, java.lang.String genesFile, java.lang.String outputfile)
      This function will read *.gotmatrix.txt files of a specific species as well as GenesAlmostAlwaysPresent.txt to compute the similarity file ready to be uploaded

      • similarityAnalysisJaccard

        public void similarityAnalysisJaccard(java.lang.String species,
                             java.lang.String genesFile,
                             java.lang.String outputfile)
        This function will read *.gotmatrix.txt files of a specific species as well as GenesAlmostAlwaysPresent.txt to compute the similarity file ready to be uploaded
        Parameters:
        species - Species to compute
        genesFile - List of genes to consider
        outputfile - Where the analysis will be stored

      • compareTwoEditions

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.ArrayList<ubc.pavlab.gotrack.go.SimilarityAnalysis.JaccardEntry>> compareTwoEditions(java.util.List<java.lang.String> genes,
                                                                                                                            java.io.File editionA,
                                                                                                                            java.io.File editionB)
        This function uses the jaccard similarity to tell how similar is one gene in edition X to itself in edition Y (last edition)
        Parameters:
        genes - Is a list of ordered genes
        editionA - Edition number A
        editionB - Edition number B
        Returns:
        Map that links a gene to the similarity score in edition A

      • gotrackSemanticAnalysis

        public static void gotrackSemanticAnalysis(java.lang.String species,
                           java.lang.String genesFile,
                           java.lang.String outputfile)
        This is a wrapper function to be called by GOtrack
        Parameters:
        species - Species to Compute
        genesFile - Genes always present or Genes almost always present file
        outputfile - Where the jaccard analysis is written
